8995de25-d442-4901-a87a-289197b858a9.description: GBM Academy is a non-profit program that seeks to extend the knowledge of technologies in universities and educational institutions. This badge is obtained as a result of the active participation of teachers and students in a series of sessions related to the application of data science in real projects.
8995de25-d442-4901-a87a-289197b858a9.name: GBM Academy Award

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this accreditation, it was necessary to participate in two-hour sessions with IBM instructors and specialists who guided the laboratory and learning activities.
As pre-work activities, participants required to download Watson Studio, install it on their computers and register in the IBM Cloud.

078e1d0b-7a06-43df-ad33-87759e8526e4.description: GBM Academy is a non-profit program that seeks to extend the knowledge of technologies in universities and educational institutions. 078e1d0b-7a06-43df-ad33-87759e8526e4.name: GBM Academy Award

1c20f4eb-61b9-40df-8b8a-7a83c16d3d20.description: This badge is a recognition for those who were willing to give a little more of themselves in the most difficult moments, those who put their superpowers at the service of a higher goal.

da2b7671-63cd-49a7-9afa-5d554de8729d.description: This badge is reserved for those who demonstrated that nothing is impossible when working with passion, dedication and that no matter what the obstacles were, they searched for the superhero they have inside to reach and exceed their goals.

1a577d96-2080-426c-a47c-7dc5173a24a9.description: This badge is for those who were victorious in each battle they faced, those who constantly knew how to move forward to achieve the proposed objectives, and in the process they became heroes.

4ceba024-a9a1-45e5-9d29-a79c0284506d.description: Game Changers is a GBM program that promotes the development and research of innovative ideas through challenges and workshops established by the organization. This badge is obtained as a result of individual's or team's active participation in searching for new ways to solve current or future business problems.
4ceba024-a9a1-45e5-9d29-a79c0284506d.name: GBM Game Changers Award

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this accreditation, it was necessary to register in one of the workshops established by the program and provide a description of the idea, its value proposition, and documents or images that allow a better understanding.
Participants need to develop their ideas through the tools enabled by the innovation team and also prepare the pitch of their solution proposal.

Participants should work on their idea during a half-day session and prepare the necessary information for the final phase which consists of presenting the idea to the audience and obtaining their feedback and recommendations.

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this accreditation, it was necessary to register in one of the challenges established by the program, provide the description of the idea, their value proposition and documents or images that allow a better understanding.
As pre-work activities, participants need to develop their ideas through the tools enabled by the innovation team and also prepare their pitch of their solution proposal.
Participants should work on their idea for two or three weeks in preparation for the final phase which consists of presenting the idea to the committee and obtaining their final evaluation.

a5c9655a-01a7-4e1d-ae47-5ef86aed5bdd.description: The Gold Innovation Badge is awarded to those who's development skills in cloud based applications go beyond the standard and their creative ideas change the status quo of any solutions we develop in our company.
